edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer

Interface UtteranceGraph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UtteranceHMMGraph

    public interface UtteranceGraph
    Interface to the UtteranceGraph, a graph of an utterance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Graph transcriptGraph)
      Add a transcript graph to the current utterance graph.
      Node getFinalNode()
      Gets the final node in this graph
      Node getInitialNode()
      Gets the initial node in this graph
      Node getNode(int index)
      Get node at the specified position in the list.
      int indexOf(Node node)
      Gets the index of a particular node in the graph.
      boolean isFinalNode(Node node)
      Returns whether the given node is the final node in this graph.
      boolean isInitialNode(Node node)
      Returns whether the given node is the initial node in this graph.
      int size()
      Returns the size of a graph.
      boolean validate()
      Validate the graph.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Graph transcriptGraph)
        Add a transcript graph to the current utterance graph.
        Parameters:
        transcriptGraph - the transcript graph to add

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the size of a graph. This is the number of nodes in a graph.

      • getNode

        Node getNode(int index)
        Get node at the specified position in the list. The order is the same in which the nodes were entered.
        Parameters:
        index - index of item to retun
        Returns:
        the node

      • getInitialNode

        Node getInitialNode()
        Gets the initial node in this graph
        Returns:
        the initial node

      • getFinalNode

        Node getFinalNode()
        Gets the final node in this graph
        Returns:
        the final node

      • isInitialNode

        boolean isInitialNode(Node node)
        Returns whether the given node is the initial node in this graph.
        Parameters:
        node - the node we want to compare
        Returns:
        if true, the node is the initial node

      • isFinalNode

        boolean isFinalNode(Node node)
        Returns whether the given node is the final node in this graph.
        Parameters:
        node - the node we want to compare
        Returns:
        if true, the node is the final node

      • indexOf

        int indexOf(Node node)
        Gets the index of a particular node in the graph.
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        Returns:
        the index

      • validate

        boolean validate()
        Validate the graph. It checks out basics about the graph, such as whether all nodes have at least one incoming and outgoing edge, except for the initial and final.
        Returns:
        if true, graph validation passed
